message: Let's split the money 60/40. A fair deal for both of us right now.
Let's be reasonable, Alice. I'm offering you 45 dollars which is more than the 40 you offered me.  This deal makes sense considering the shrinking pot.
Bob, let's be realistic. I'm offering you 45 again, but this time before inflation eats away at it further. This is your last chance for a good deal!
